# Read inputs
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

# Initialize counter
count = 0

# Repeat operation until A has 1 or fewer positive elements
while sum(x > 0 for x in a) > 1:
    # Sort in descending order
    a.sort(reverse=True)
    
    # Decrease the two largest elements by 1
    a[0] -= 1
    a[1] -= 1
    
    # Increment counter
    count += 1

# Print the answer
print(count)
